messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] need recommendations for dance, ballet and gymnastics...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/30/2007 3:24:26 P.M. Pacific Daylight Time, dvictor1@cox.net writes: My 2  year old turns three in October, so this is something we might
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/30/2007 3:24:26 P.M. Pacific Daylight Time,
dvictor1@... writes:

My 2 year old
turns three in October, so this is something we might be interested in.


Do you have a Parks and Recreation facility near you? Or in a neighboring
town? They are generally cheaper than a private dance or gymnastics class and
are more flexible, less rigid, that kind of thing. Good luck! we're looking
for Mexican dancing and tap over here...no luck so far...(Julian wants to be in
a class with boys and at age 4, that seems to be sadly, nearly impossible :(
)

Karen
